Gi Doors.description: Built from premium galvanised steel, our GI doors provide heightened security with lock points and heavy-duty hinges. These steel wood doors are perfect for homes looking for a balance of affordability and luxury.

variants.name: GI SM 50 T
variants.description: READY TO INSTALL DOOR, HIIGHER GSM ZINC GALVANISED STEEL WITH ADDITIONAL POWDER COATING AND HTPT. DOORS WITH AESTHETIC DESIGN, FEATURING THE MOST RELIABLE AND TESTED LOCKING SYSTEM

details.panelStuffing: Door panel stuffing with rock wool / honey comp paper

lockingSystem.primary: Multi point, multi position, single key operated lever locks.
lockingSystem.secondary: Additional secondary security lock with 6 keys

details.finish: Matt finish Heat Transmission Painting Technology (MHTPT)
details.protection: Termite proof, sound proof, dust proof, anti-corrosive
